description: Situated in the centre of a village in the Bassa Bergamasca area, this long-established, family-run restaurant has a rustic decor softened by the owners’ female touch. The overall feel is that of an elegant trattoria, which provides a pleasant backdrop for delicious specialities from this lowland region, including meat cooked over the large grill in the dining room. There’s also a gazebo for alfresco dining in summer.
